name: Fuzion Nutrition Food Scale, Digital Food Scale for Weight Loss, Calculating Food Facts, Macro, Calorie, Meal Prep, Portion Control, Stainless Steel
short_description: Nutritional Calculator: The scale features a built-in nutritional calculator that displays calories, protein, fat, carbohydrates, cholesterol, salt and fiber for 999 pre-programmed foods, making it easy to track your daily nutrition intake.

Accurate and Versatile: The Fuzion Nutrition Scale provides accurate and consistent measurements with a 6.6lb capacity and 0.02oz readability, making it perfect for weighing ingredients for recipes, portion control, and meal planning.

This feature allows you to save the weight of each ingredient and recall it later for accurate portion control and tracking. With the ability to easily monitor your intake over time, this scale is perfect for meal prep, calorie counting, and macro tracking.

LCD Screen and TARE: The large, high-contrast LCD screen displays your measurements and nutritional information clearly and accurately, making it easy to read even in dim lighting conditions. It also has a low battery indicator to alert you when it's time to replace the batteries. With the Tare function, you can easily subtract the weight of any bowl or container, ensuring that you're only measuring the weight of the food inside.

5 Units of Measurement: g, lb:oz, oz, ml and fl.oz - making it incredibly versatile and suitable for any recipe or cooking style. Whether you're measuring liquids or solids, our scale has got you covered.

Fuzion Support: NS1-3000 food scale arrives calibrated. We offer lifetime support to our customers. Service team are always glad to help with all your questions or concerns. Fuzion have you backed with a 10-Years WARRANTY.
